content.rendered:
The list of big companies who are doing mass lay-offs is rapidly increasing: Google, Amazon, PayPal, Meta, HubSpot, Disney… and of course, the drama at Twitter HQ after Elon Musk took over.

The future looks bleak for many talented individuals.

But that means the future is bright for companies like ours who are looking to grow! We get to have a pick of some fantastic talent in the market who are now suddenly available.

Why are we hiring in an economic crisis?

We have recently downsized to upgrade.

To many, that makes absolutely no sense as growth is one of the most important metrics in business.

However, we’re on a very exciting journey and have recently landed some bigger clients and we only want the best possible people on our team to ensure client satisfaction.

Therefore, we’re now looking for ambitious and talented people to join the RankHive team.

Who are we looking for?

As a purpose-driven agency, we like to work with clients with a similar outlook. We work with them because we genuinely care and want to see them succeed, rather than just thinking about our bottom line.

Therefore, we want to have a team who shares our visions and values so that they can produce the best work for these clients.

We have strong sustainability goals and work with each of our clients to lower their digital carbon footprint.

We also have a pro-bono scheme where we give away £30k of work per year to registered charities in England & Wales. We run a charity dinner for these charities each year too, in order to raise further funds for them.

We’d love to have people join our team who get excited with passion projects like these.

What vacancies do we currently have?

We are currently looking for the following:

  • Account/Project Manager
  • Head of Branding/Marketing
  • WordPress Developer
  • Digital Marketing Assistant

We’re all working on a hybrid basis at the moment, so we do expect our team to come into the office to work together and collaborate on projects about 3 times per week.

How do we apply?

Please do ensure you read the job descriptions for each job extremely carefully to ensure it’s the right role for you.

If you like the sound of it, then the best way is to apply via the form directly on the job page. Alternatively, please email careers@wearecomplexcreative.com

For more details about the company benefits and the job application process, please check out our careers page.
